Identification.ShortTitle: One-day Local Employment Seminars Fee or Charge Order
Identification.LongTitle: Order Prescribing the Fees or Charges To Be Paid by Participants to One-Day Local Employer Seminars Hosted by Canada Employment Centres Across Canada

Provision.Text: The Minister of Employment and Immigration, pursuant to Order in Council P.C. 1986-2103 of September 11, 1986*, hereby makes the annexed Order prescribing the fees or charges to be paid by participants to one-day local employer seminars hosted by Canada Employment Centres across Canada.

Footnote.Text: SI/86-179, 1986 Canada Gazette Part II, p. 4245

Section.Text: This Order may be cited as the One-Day Local Employment Seminars Fee or Charge Order.
The fee or charge to be paid by each participant to the one-day local employer seminars hosted by Canada Employment Centres across Canada is $25.
